trait.name: Two Heads
text: The two-headed owlbear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.

trait.name: Wakeful
text: When one of the owlbear's heads is asleep, its other head is awake.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The two-headed owlbear makes three attacks: two with its beaks and one with its claws.

action.name: Beak
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.
